features: ▶【Durable Design】: Different from the shape and material of other car interior lights, we are hard light bar, not easy to deform, not easy to aging, can be repeatedly removed and installed, high secondary utilization rate.

▶【Vivid Color】: Double row light bead design, this car led lights has a larger luminous area, with a light angle of up to 180 degrees. The light is clearer, and the colors cover the entire carriage, blending better with the atmosphere inside the car, providing a pleasant driving experience for you.

▶【Dynamic Music Sync】: The led car lights with built-in mic help sync the car interior lights with any music type. Make your daily commute, road trips, or weekend vacations full of vitality and eliminate fatigue, with colors dancing with your favorite songs, enhance your driving pleasure.

▶【Smart Color Mode】: 16 million available colors, choose the car LED light effect according to your preference in the intuitive DIY mode through "Smart Life-Smart Living "App. The control box allows you to select your favorite colors and modes directly without using your phone, more convenient. Perfect for your different driving moods or different holiday decorations.

▶【Easy to install and hide】: Fix the led lights for car to your vehicle with strong double-sided tape and screws after ensuring the surface is dry and clean. 2 Lines Design,1 main line separated into 2 branch lines,easier to hide the wiring under the car mat, without worrying about exposed wiring or an unkempt appearance..The best choice for car accessories.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Car Led Lights with Music Dance Multi Colors The led lights for car with simple design but sturdy and durable. This interior car lights is creativity, art, simplicity and personality. Our hard light strips outperform other soft car light strips in terms of appearance, shape, and bead arrangement.

A Better Gift Car Accessories for Women Men Feature Description: Common functions: Music sync, LED RGB lights, Multi-colors, Brightness adjustment Control method: APP and box Power supply: Cigarette lighter DC 12V After turning on the car lights, the vivid lights cover the entire soles of your feet, and the clear sense of ambiance of the interior lights can bring you a pleasant mood and sweep away the tiredness.

2 Control Methods You can switch the Color by APP & Box control for this car interior lights. Use the "Smart Life-Smart Living" app to get more DIY effects! Use the "Box Controller" to enjoy a more convenient operation experience. Press the "Music" button on the box, the lights and sounds inside the car will be sync, and the light colors that dance vibrantly to your favorite songs.

More Durable Car Interior Ambiance Lights Luxury upgrade+: 1: Hard light bar, not easily deformed. 2: Frosted transparent panel, not prone to aging. 3: Straight light bar for easier cleaning. Can be repeatedly removed and installed, high secondary utilization rate.
Music Dance Lights Let's start now Provide a wonderful driving experience for your daily commuting, road trips, or weekend vacations. Create a great atmosphere for your family, friends, passengers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install, looks great
reviews.reviewText: Installed in a Toyota Corolla successfully. Was able to use zip ties to mount the lights for 3 seats, and screws for the last. I had to double up the zip ties to make them fit around a bracket for the front passenger's seat. Zip ties were a bit small and thin, so you may need to purchase better ones to mount this in certain cars.The only issue I had was with the app. The connection the devices seems finicky, and I wasn't able to connect to the lights and turn down the brightness when I needed to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install plenty of wire to work with easy to use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The YiLaie Interior Car Lights have completely transformed the ambiance inside my car, adding a touch of style and vibrancy to my driving experience. These smart LED lights are not just functional; they're also a lot of fun.The standout feature here is the app control. With the accompanying app, I can easily change the colors, brightness, and lighting patterns to suit my mood and preferences. The music sync feature is a blast – the lights dance to the rhythm of the music, creating a club-like atmosphere inside the car.The RGB color-changing capability allows for endless customization options, and it's a hit with both men and women who have ridden in my car. The installation was straightforward, and they connect seamlessly to my car's DC 12V charger.The hard lights bar design ensures durability and stability. I appreciate that they don't move around or fall off during drives, even on bumpy roads.These interior car lights have made nighttime driving a more enjoyable experience for me and my passengers. They're also great for setting the mood during road trips or simply adding a bit of flair to the car's interior.In summary, the YiLaie Interior Car Lights are a fantastic car accessory that brings both functionality and entertainment to your vehicle. They're easy to control, visually stunning, and a hit with everyone who steps into my car.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Unfortunately it didn't come with an USB port
reviews.reviewText: well, it lights up very well and the App works as advertised, if you want you can also use the included controller, my only critic will be the bulky adapter, most cars are coming with USB ports, don't know why they didn't included as an option. The brightness is amazing and it comes with everything you need for installation, which is done in a breeze. If you want to make it glow like in the product pictures they need to be installed in front and back below your seats if space allows, not under the console. Unless you want only the front part to be super bright (2 Lights in Driver's and Passenger's), you could install it under your console (recommended if your car is only 2-Doors or Hatchback.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars All One Unit...
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this set of lights to replace one I had purchased years ago and the APP was no longer supported. I wrongfully assumed that I would be able to replace the old one with the new one and not have any issues. I took these lights out of the box and was shocked to find out that it was all in one piece. I wouldn't be able to feed the cables/wire through tight places like I could before. My vehicle has always been on the difficult side when adding things like this. So, I either have to have a bunch of unsightly wires all over and risk catching them, or I have to risk splicing the wires. I haven't decided yet what I want to do with this.🐻 *Statement/Disclaimer: This review is part of Amazon's Vine Program which provides products at a reduced cost in exchange for sincere/frank reviews. The products are not offered completely gratis, as their value is taxed as income in the US. I take pride in writing honest, accurate reviews based on many product factors. I try, use, and test all products that I provide a review. Once a review is posted, I will not alter that review for any reason, even if contact from a Vine provider has been made to rectify a negative product experience through Amazon Messaging. The opinions and statements above are my own and may not reflect others' experiences.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install, and these things are bright!!
reviews.reviewText: In the past, I have installed similar items in the old cars that we had before, but those were flexible strips of LEDs with similar controllers. This solution is far superior.Easier to install, simply because they had more surface area to stick too where they were stuck on, and also because either end of the LEDs had loops where I was able to more securely fit them using cable ties.The wiring was sufficient to run it around the interior of a Land Rover LR4 and the lights were very satisfyingly bright, the controls are easy to understand (don't need a bluetooth app like the old ones I had in the past) and .. generally, cannot complain.Given the way that these are built, I these will also last a fair while longer than the traditional strip mounted lights. Recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Turn your car into a club
reviews.reviewText: This led ambient lights is fun little lights to be added to your personal vehicle. It come with screws that stays better than 3m tape because some of the surface is kind of hard to stick with 3m tape. You could find some metal underneath of seat to screw the lights on. It's solid LED so it lighten up very pretty and it's different than Dot leds. It come with so much different mode and colors. Overall, it's very pretty led ambient light that will added a club vibe to your car and will not affect your driving.Plus, you don't have to hard wire it.
